openKeybindingSettings.name: openKeybindingSettings
openKeybindingSettings.description: Open the global settings page of keybindings (keyboard shortcuts) of vscode. It is the same as the command @command:workbench.action.openGlobalKeybindings.

openAndSetKeybinding.name: openAndSetKeybinding
openAndSetKeybinding.description: Set keybinding (keyboard shortcut) of a command.

commandName.description: NOT EMPTY STRING! The name of the command (e.g. @command:workbench.action.openGlobalKeybindings) to set, or short description in nature language of command to set.
